listitem.para: Set the delay (in time units, defaults to seconds) between Dead Peer Detection (IKEv1 RFC 3706) or IKEv2 Liveness keepalives that are sent for this connection (default 0 seconds). Set to enable checking.
If dpddelay is set, you might need to adjust retransmit-timeout for IKEv2 and you must set dpdtimeout for IKEv1.
